text: A fox entered a flock of lambs, and, holding a little lamb to her chest, pretended to caress it. Then a dog from the herdsman came up to him and asked, "What are you doing? "I'll caress him and play with him", replied the whore with an innocent face. - Then let him go right now if you don't want to know my best caresses! The unprepared is told by their actions.
title: La zorra y el perro
author: nan Esopo
